description: A **custom field answer** stores arbitrary data about an applicant, answering the question posed by a **custom field**.

links.description: Display an existing custom field answer.
links.title: Show

___field_type.description: Type of data that the **custom field** stores.

___value.description: The ISO 8601 date to be stored as an answer to the **custom field**.

links.description: Store a **custom field** value.  If a value has not previously been stored, this *creates* an answer.  Otherwise, this *updates* an existing answer.
links.title: Store

links.description: Clear an existing custom field answer.  (Same semantics as `PUT` with `"value": null`.)  This is a "soft delete" that tracks who made the change.
links.title: Destroy

title: Custom Field Answer (Date)

___field_type.description: Type of data that the **custom field** stores.

___value.description: The ISO 8601 date stored as an answer to the **custom field**.

___custom_field_id.description: Unique identifier of the **custom field** that this answers.

___label.description: Human-readable label of the **custom field** that this answers.
